id.description: primary key for the record as UUID

state.description:
The state of the course carrying information on what to display on a course glimpse.

The game is to find the highest priority state for this course among
its course runs and its products.

Admin Serializer for OrderGroup model reserved to create action.

Unlike `AdminOrderGroupSerializer`, it allows to pass a product to create
the order group.

language.description:
Language of the contract definition

* `en-us` - English
* `fr-fr` - French

is_listed.description: If checked the course run will be included in the list of course runs available for enrollment on the related course page.

nb_seats.title: Number of seats
nb_seats.description: The maximum number of orders that can be validated for a given order group
